name: Archimedes
title: Greek mathematician
quote: Do not disturb my circles!" (Μή μου τοὺς κύκλους τάραττε!)
context: to a Roman soldier who interrupted his geometric experiments during the capture of Syracuse, whereupon the soldier killed him

name: Julius Caesar
title: Roman dictator (15 March 44 BC), discovering that his stepson Brutus was among his murderers.
quote: You too, my child?" (Καὶ σὺ, τέκνον;)

name: Jesus
title: founder of Christianity
context: right before his death by crucifixion

name: Joseph Trumpeldor
title: Jewish Zionist activist
quote: Never mind, it is good to die for our country." ("אין דבר, טוב למות בעד ארצנו")
context: after being mortally wounded at the Battle of Tel Hai

name: Stjepan Filipović
title: Yugoslav communist
quote: Death to fascism! Freedom to the people!" (Smrt fašizmu, sloboda narodu!)

name: Todd Beamer
title: American passenger on United Airlines Flight 93
quote: Are you guys ready? Let's roll.
context: signaling the start of the revolt against the flight's hijackers, resulting in the plane crashing in the ensuing struggle for the controls, killing all 44 aboard

name: Eric Garner
title: American former horticulturist
context: after being put in a chokehold by an arresting NYPD shortly before losing consciousness and dying
